ComicInfo.Series: Pinocchio: Vampire Slayer - Of Wood and Blood
ComicInfo.Summary: After being left for dead, adrift in the middle of the Mediterranean, Pinocchio and what remains of the Great Puppet Theater wash ashore on a mysterious island. But before they can resume their efforts to save Carlotta from the vampires, they must first survive the deadly Vrykolakas. This is the first chapter of Pinocchio, Vampire Slayer: Of Wood and Blood, the final chapter in the critically acclaimed trilogy!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:14:16. [CVDB336452]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dracula, Geppetto, Gideon, Honest John Foulfellow, Jiminy Cricket, Monstro, Pinocchio
ComicInfo.Locations: Buenos Aires, Cairo, London, New Delhi, San Francisco
